Package translator

Class Summary
ActivatableVisitor Create a visitor structure that only processes classes on demand.
JavaClass A representation of a java class.
JavaFile A representation of a java file.
JavaMethod A representation of a java method.
JavaPackages Provides a nice interface to Translator.
JavaScope Handles anything that can have its own scope, from a File to a Block.
Translator The public interface to our Java to C++ translator.
